dict.acceptation: 智力；聪颖；情报；情报机构；

sent.orig: The next three, INTELLIGENCE, STRENGTH, and SPEED, are the actual attributes being set.
sent.trans: 接下来的三条INTELLIGENCE、STRENGTH、SPEED是实际被设置的属性。

sent.orig: With the limitation of traditional intelligence test, three new ideas of intelligence emotional intelligence, were constructed.
sent.trans: 传统智力测验的单一性和其预测的有限性为其它类型智力概念的提出留下了空间。

sent.orig: Each organisation has its own intelligence and counter-intelligence units.
sent.trans: 每个组织都有它自己的谍报部门和反谍报部门。

sent.orig: In the process of learning, intelligence factors and intelligence factors are equally important.
sent.trans: 在一个人的学习中，智力因素和非智力因素是同等重要的。

sent.orig: Intelligence solves problems and produces money. Money without financial intelligence is money soon gone.
sent.trans: 知识才能解决问题并创造财富，不是凭财务知识挣来的钱很快就会消失。
